localizedMeta.description:
DIESER INHALT IST NICHT MIT Android™-GERÄTEN KOMPATIBEL.

Dank ihrer kreativität und auf die anwendung eines stärken laser bzw. Mit vielen optischen werkzeuge, wirst du unmögliche ziele zerstören können.

Paketgröße: 61 MB - Mehr Speicherplatz für die Installation erforderlich

Kompatibilitätsinformationen:
Anzahl von Spielern für lokales Spiel: 1 Spieler

Unterstützte Schnittstellen/Sensoren
- Touchscreen
- Controller/Bildschirm-Controller

Unterstützte Sprachen:
Deutsch/Englisch(USA)/Englisch(Großbritannien)/Spanisch/Französisch/Italienisch/Japanisch

This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Play an incredible puzzle in which you will have to destroy an impossible targets. In order to do that you will have many optical instruments and a heavy laser.

Package size: 61 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
German/English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Spanish/French/Italian/Japanese

This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Play an incredible puzzle in which you will have to destroy an impossible targets. In order to do that you will have many optical instruments and a heavy laser.

Package size: 61 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Play an incredible puzzle in which you will have to destroy an impossible targets. In order to do that you will have many optical instruments and a heavy laser.

Package size: 61 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
German/English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Spanish/French/Italian/Japanese

This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Play an incredible puzzle in which you will have to destroy an impossible targets. In order to do that you will have many optical instruments and a heavy laser.

Package size: 61 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
German/English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Spanish/French/Italian/Japanese

This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

ESTE CONTENIDO NO ES COMPATIBLE CON DISPOSITIVOS Android™.

Gracias a tu ingenio y a la utilización de un potente láser, junto con varios instrumentos ópticos, serás capaz de destruir objetivos imposibles.

Tamaño del paquete: 61 MB. Se requiere más espacio de almacenamiento para la instalación

Información de compatibilidad:
Número de jugadores para juego local: 1 jugador

Interfaces/sensores compatibles
- Pantalla táctil
- Mando / mando en pantalla

Idiomas compatibles:
Alemán/Inglés(Estados Unidos)/Inglés(Reino Unido)/Español/Francés/Italiano/Japonés

This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

CE CONTENU N'EST PAS COMPATIBLE AVEC LES PÉRIPHÉRIQUES Android™.

Grâce à ton astuce et à l' utilisation d'un puissant laser, avec également plusieurs instruments optiques, tu seras capable de détruire des cibles impossibles.

Taille du paquet : 61 Mo - Nécessite un plus grand espace de stockage pour l’installation

Informations sur la compatibilité :
Nombre de joueurs pour jeu local : 1 joueur

Interfaces/détecteurs pris en charge
- Écran tactile
- Manette / Manette à l’écran

Langues prises en charge :
Allemand/Anglais(États-Unis)/Anglais(Royaume-Uni)/Espagnol/Français/Italien/Japonais

This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

QUESTO CONTENUTO NON È COMPATIBILE CON I DISPOSITIVI Android™.

Grazie alla sua intelligenza e all' uso di un laser molto potente, combinato con altri strumenti ottici sarai capace di distruggere obbiettivi impossibili.

Dimensioni del pacchetto: 61 MB - Spazio di archiviazione aggiuntivo richiesto per l'installazione

Informazioni sulla compatibilità:
Numero di giocatori per la riproduzione in locale: 1 giocatore

Interfacce/sensori supportati
- Touchscreen
- Controller / Controller su schermo

Lingue supportate:
Tedesco/Inglese(Stati Uniti)/Inglese(Regno Unito)/Spagnolo/Francese/Italiano/Giapponese

This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

このコンテンツはAndroid™端末非対応です。

創造性に加えて、様々な光学機器と一緒に強力レーザーを使うことによって、君は本来不可能な敵までも破壊するだろう。

コンテンツ容量: 61 MB

プレイ人数: 1人

対応機能:
- タッチスクリーン
- コントローラーまたは、オンスクリーンコントローラー

対応言語:
ドイツ語/英語(アメリカ)/英語(イギリス)/スペイン語/フランス語/イタリア語/日本語

著作権等:
This game and its images have been designed for PlayStation(R)Mobile and PlayStation(R)Vita by Rafael Ponce, Ph.D.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
